definition: classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare
a piece of land of 1.3 mu 畝|亩[mu3]/(fig.) one's turf

sentences.english: Hence, it nourishes the best 420 mu tea garden in Nanyue.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這裏也潤澤着南嶽最好的420畝茶園。

sentences.english: Planted 300 acres of apple orchard and 500 acres of fine chestnut base.
sentences.chinese: 種植了300畝精品蘋果園和500畝板栗基地。

sentences.english: Planted 300 acres of apple orchard and 500 acres of fine chestnut base.
sentences.chinese: 種植了300畝精品蘋果園和500畝板栗基地。

sentences.english: Furthermore my family only has 6 mu of irrigated land and the harvest was fairly ordinary.
sentences.chinese: 而且家裏僅有6畝水澆地的收成也一般。

sentences.english: The company total amount of investment is 100 million RMB and covers 316 acres.
sentences.chinese: 公司投資總額1億元人民幣，佔地面積316畝。

sentences.english: We mus plant more trees and stop the people cutting them .
sentences.chinese: 我們畝種植更多的樹木和停止削減他們的人。

sentences.english: The company occupies 736 acres of plant mentioned in the United States red wine grapes.
sentences.chinese: 公司佔地736畝種植美國紅提及釀酒葡萄。

sentences.english: Located in Songjiang Industrial Park, Shanghai, with the land areas of 81 Mus.
sentences.chinese: 位於上海市松江工業區，佔地面積81畝。

sentences.english: This quarter of an acre, so poorly planted.
sentences.chinese: 在那四分之一畝的地方，樹木既種得那樣少。

sentences.english: "Tsukuda a number of town, where the number of acres, " then, each of the coupon books are.
sentences.chinese: “佃田若干町，凡若干畝”的話，每一券書均有之。

sentences.english: The park is in the south of our city, covering an area of 500 mu.
Current, base of grow seedlings of Chinese white poplar of 4000 mus of triploid already took shape.
sentences.chinese: 目前，4000畝三倍體毛白楊育苗基地已初具規模。

definition: area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
